'''"Creator (Music Box)"''' refers to both a song composed by [[Lena Raine]], and a [[music disc]] that plays the song when inserted in a [[jukebox]]. The music disc is obtained from [[trial chambers]], as a rare drop from [[decorated pot]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|disc-creator-music-box}}

{{Music disclaimer}}
[[File:Creator (Music Box Version).ogg]]

The music box version of "Creator" plays the main melody of the song with only a {{w|music box}} and none of the other accompanying instruments in the original track. It also lacks the key change present in the original.

== Usage ==
Like all music discs, {{control|using}} the "Creator (Music Box)" music disc on a [[jukebox]] causes the jukebox to play the song.

If the [[player]] places a [[redstone comparator]] besides a jukebox playing "Creator (Music Box)", it will emit a [[Redstone mechanics|redstone signal]] of 11.
